name: get_2_thumbnail_ready
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pagepeeker.
Tool description: Automate website screenshots creation.  Generate screenshots in a matter of seconds.  Never busy, so there's no waiting in line.  Rendering starts immediately and is finished quickly.
API description: Poll this API until it returns that the image is available.  If available, you can download through endpoint 1.  Rendering an image depends largely on how fast a particular web page is loaded (and if it contains Flash).  Average waiting time is around 20 - 60 seconds

size.description: t = Tiny, 90 x 68 pixels;  s= Small, 120 x 90 pixels;  m = Medium, 200 x 150 pixels; l = Large, 400 x 300 pixels;  x = Extra large, 480 x 360 pixels

url.description: The URL from which to generate the thumbnail.
